text: E'ina hu'negu tamagra antahi ankeresazana, Anumzamo tahokehe'zana megi'a vahete atregeno e'ne hu'za zamagra antahigahaze.28:28-29 Fima me'nea kea omane'ne hu'za korapa antahi'zane vahe'mo'za hu'naze. Anagema Polima huvarege'za, Juda vahe'mo'za atre'za nevazageno, zamagra zamagra franevaziza nehu'za vu'za e'za hu'naze.
